title: Create a Google Calendar for a Group
content: Say you’d like to have a team calendar for team events, or a specific calendar based on theme (like new hire start dates and anniversaries), please see the instructions below to meet your needs. Instructions: Create a Calendar If you’d like to create a calendar that is not your personal calendar, please take the following steps… Open Google Calendar . On the left-hand side navigation menu, identify Other calendars . Click the
